concept.title: JMS Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The JMS Consumer reads data from a Java Messaging Service (JMS). The JMS Consumer also supports messages written in the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP).

conbody.p: JMS Consumer originovervieworiginsJMS ConsumerWhen you configure a JMS Consumer, you configure the connection information and the queue or topic name. You can optionally use JMS credentials to access JMS, and remove control characters. You can optionally define a JMS message selector to specify the messages that the origin reads.
For text data, the JMS Consumer supports reading the BytesMessage message format.
